string.text: 23mm shell with 8 #00 pellets. Application range up to 25 meters. It is used for firing from the KS-23 carbine. Due to the fact that the barrel has rifling in the KS-23 carbine, the buckshot flies over a large area, which allows you to shoot offhand, practically without aiming. Fielded in limited quantities with the KS-23 as a hunting round for extremely tough mutants.\n

23mm shell with a pointed steel bullet. Employed to forcibly stop vehicles by destroying the engine block. Application range up to 100 meters. Imported by esoteric stalkers for hunting very large creatures.

A special cartridge designed for the needs of the scientific staff located in the Zone. Depending on the task, it is filled with different types of solutions. Requires very careful handling. How to use: very slowly put into the weapon.
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Highest pierced armor class: %c[ui_gray_1]none
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Tissue damage rating: %c[ui_gray_1]none
%c[ui_gray_1]SPECIAL:
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Using a thin wolfram needle, it pierces the skin of the mutants to inject the solution.

Special use cartridge developed by the Ecologist faction, part of an ongoing joint study with Duty. This cartridge contains a hollow metal ball filled with a liquid toxin derived from chemical anomalies. On impact with a target, the toxin vaporizes into a chemical cloud that severely weakens the targets and produces a similar effect on any nearby targets. Against all targets it induces lethargy and weakness, making them more susceptible to impacts and other forms of damage. With mutants specifically, the round weakens their ability to exert force, reducing the strength of their attacks. Specially ordered by Duty to increase the chances of surviving highly dangerous mutant raids by weakening the stronger monsters.

Special carbine, 23 mm - Soviet multi-functional police pump-action shotgun, designed to suppress riots, selective force, mental and chemical effects on offenders. Interestingly, having a caliber of more than 20 mm and a rifled barrel, the KS-23 should not be classified as small arms, but as small-caliber artillery.\n %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: The long 700mm barrel can be replaced by short 510mm one to decrease the weight of the weapon.

Special carbine, 23 mm - Soviet multi-functional police pump-action shotgun, designed to suppress riots, selective force, mental and chemical effects on offenders. Interestingly, having a caliber of more than 20 mm and a rifled barrel, the KS-23 should not be classified as small arms, but as small-caliber artillery.\n This modification of the KS-23 has a short 510mm barrel installed on it instead of standard long 700mm one.

Shortened version of KS-23 with removable metal stock. 23 mm - Soviet multi-functional police pump-action shotgun, designed to suppress riots, selective force, mental and chemical effects on offenders. Interestingly, having a caliber of more than 20 mm and a rifled barrel, the KS-23 should not be classified as small arms, but as small-caliber artillery.\n %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: Boar Tactical Kit for KS-23M Drozd.

Shortened version with mounted Trijicon RMR reflex sight. 23 mm - Soviet multi-functional police pump-action shotgun, designed to suppress riots, selective force, mental and chemical effects on offenders. Interestingly, having a caliber of more than 20 mm and a rifled barrel, the KS-23 should not be classified as small arms, but as small-caliber artillery.
 This version has a thread for sound suppressor that can be found somewere at south locations of Zone.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: KZRZP suppressor
Modification of KS-23, developed for the needs of the scientific staff located in the Zone.
%c[ui_gray_1]Short and light barrel for KS-23 Carabine. This upgrade is irreversible.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] KS-23 Carabine

%c[ui_gray_1]The kit includes: Threaded barrel for using with suppressor and Trijicon RMR sight with mounting module. This upgrade is irreversible.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Carabine KS-23M Drozd
